title: President appoints new DERC chief, AAP says move unconstitutional
selftext:
A month ago [LG can’t thwart Delhi govt in DERC appointment: SC](https://www.hindustantimes.com/cities/delhi-news/supreme-court-rules-delhi-lg-can-t-act-on-his-own-discretion-while-appointing-derc-chairperson-process-to-be-completed-in-2-weeks-101684522664309.html)

More: https://www.aninews.in/news/national/general-news/appointment-of-derc-chairman-done-illegally-will-appeal-in-supreme-court-aap-leader-atishi20230622225553/
comments: JoeMo were claiming democracy is "in our DNA." I guess Murmur's DNA has mutated.
Says who? pAAP? sAAP? B team of BJP? A pathetic bunch of anarchists. That's all they truly are.
